text: Bardhyl Kollçaku is an Albanian military officer, currently serving as the Chief of General Staff of the Albanian Armed Forces. ==Chief of General Staff== In 2017, Kollçaku was made the new Chief of General Staff of Albanian Armed Forces by Presidential Decree, issued by President Ilir Meta. ==Personal life== Kollçaku is married to Valbona Kollçaku and has two children, Argios and Kejsi. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:People from Berat Category:Albanian generals
title: Bardhyl Kollçaku
